title: New potato, sun-dried tomato and olive salad
time: Takes 25 minutes to make, plus cooling
description: Put this Mediterannean-style new potato salad on the table, made with sun-dried tomatoes and olives for extra bursts of salty flavour.

method.Step 1: Cook the potatoes in boiling salted water for 12-15 minutes, until just tender. Drain well, and leave until cool enough to handle. Halve lengthways.

method.Step 2: Put the lemon juice, oil, chives and plenty of seasoning into a large bowl and whisk. Add the potatoes, toss and set aside to cool. Stir the tomatoes and olives through to serve.
